info.description: API for Restaurant Employee Scheduling Application (RESA)
info.title: RESA API

post.description: Creates a new token with a fresh expiry time using an existing valid token
creates a token for a user

get.description: Fetches all restaurants belonging to the authenticated user
Gets all scheduled shifts for a specific schedule
get.summary: List all shifts for a schedule

post.description: Creates a new scheduled shift for a specific schedule

get.description: Gets a specific scheduled shift by ID

delete.description: Deletes a scheduled shift by ID

patch.description: Updates an existing scheduled shift by ID

delete.description: Removes an employee assignment from a scheduled shift

patch.description: Assigns an employee to a scheduled shift

get.description: Fetches all employees for a restaurant

post.description: Creates an employee for a restaurant
Assigns multiple roles to an employee

delete.description: Removes a specific role from an employee
delete.summary: Removes a role from an employee

get.description: Fetches all roles for a restaurant

post.description: Creates a role for a restaurant

get.description: Fetches all schedules for a restaurant

post.description: Creates a schedule for a restaurant
Publishes a schedule to make it available to employees

get.description: Fetches all shift templates for a restaurant

post.description: Creates a shift template for a restaurant

get.description: Fetches a shift template by ID

delete.description: Deletes a shift template by ID

patch.description: Updates a shift template by ID

put.description: Activates/Register a user by invitation token

start_time.description: stored as TIME in db, use string to avoid timezone confusion in JSON
